title: Little Legends in summoners rift
body: I know I dont speak for everyone, but I love how cute Little Legends are, but I just dont enjoy TFT, I know they are already in ARAM, but why not add them to summoners Draft/Blind, ranked maybe but thats a different story. They would be a little extra cosmetic to be shown off by players, not subtracting from their original point, but can still be seen in Leagues main map.

I want it out of aram. 
Why even implement it in ARAM if you haven't in SR?
are we the minority to annoy?

I am a cute person who likes cute things. My bed is covered in cute things. I like cute things.
But no.
Keep that shi* outta my rift.
Thank you.

The reason they are not in SR is visual clutter, i would imagine. I have actually pondered this; they would either need to be limited to certain spots, or something players can turn off locally. And they would need to respect fog of war, which they dont properly do in ARAM.
thats what I figured, they might need to tweak it a bit, but it would still be neat to have around you
